name: Carnival Whac-A-Mole
description:
This game is about hitting the most moles in a short amount of time, you only have 3 lives, if one of them gets away you'll lose a live, if you hit one that is currently protected (The "don't hit" light is on that color) you'll also lose a live!

Please take the time to rate the game, it's the only way I can improve my games.
